title: The Metropolitan Museum of Art - Pay What You Wish
date: Daily for NY residents, others suggested donation
place: The Met Fifth Avenue, 1000 5th Ave, New York
desc: Suggested admission $30, but you pay what you wish. Free for all children under 12.

title: Whitney Museum - Free Friday Nights
place: Whitney Museum, 99 Gansevoort St, New York
desc: Pay-what-you-wish admission every Friday evening. Suggested donation $20, but you can pay any amount.

title: Brooklyn Museum - First Saturday
date: First Saturday of each month, 5:00-11:00 PM
place: Brooklyn Museum, 200 Eastern Pkwy, Brooklyn
desc: Free admission, live music, dance parties, and art-making activities. Very popular!

title: Staten Island Ferry
place: Whitehall Terminal, Manhattan to St. George, Staten Island
desc: Completely free ferry with stunning views of the Statue of Liberty and NYC skyline.

title: Getty Center - Free Admission
place: Getty Center, 1200 Getty Center Dr, Los Angeles
desc: Free admission to museum with stunning city views and art collections. Parking fee applies.

title: Natural History Museum - Free Tuesdays
place: Natural History Museum, 900 Exposition Blvd, Los Angeles
desc: Free admission for all visitors on the first Tuesday of every month.

title: Hammer Museum - Free Admission
place: Hammer Museum, 10899 Wilshire Blvd, Los Angeles
desc: Completely free contemporary art museum. No reservation needed.

title: Griffith Park & Observatory
place: Griffith Observatory, Los Angeles
desc: Free hiking trails and free admission to the observatory. Parking is limited.

title: Art Institute of Chicago - Free for Illinois Residents
place: Art Institute of Chicago, 111 S Michigan Ave
desc: Free evening admission for Illinois residents. Proof of residency required.

title: Lincoln Park Zoo
place: Lincoln Park Zoo, 2001 N Clark St, Chicago
desc: One of the oldest free zoos in the US. Completely free, year-round.

title: Millennium Park Summer Music
place: Jay Pritzker Pavilion, Millennium Park, Chicago
desc: Free concerts featuring Chicago Symphony Orchestra and other artists.

title: Navy Pier Fireworks
place: Navy Pier, Chicago
desc: Free fireworks displays over Lake Michigan during summer.

title: Houston Museum of Natural Science - Free Thursdays
place: HMNS, 5555 Hermann Park Dr, Houston
desc: Free admission to permanent exhibits for all visitors.

title: Menil Collection
place: Menil Collection, 1533 Sul Ross St, Houston
desc: World-class art museum with completely free admission. Parking also free.

title: Desert Botanical Garden - Free Days
place: Desert Botanical Garden, 1201 N Galvin Pkwy, Phoenix
desc: Free admission for Arizona residents on designated days. Check website.

title: Phoenix Art Museum - Free Wednesdays
place: Phoenix Art Museum, 1625 N Central Ave
desc: Free admission for all visitors on Wednesday evenings.

title: Philadelphia Museum of Art - Pay What You Wish
date: First Sunday of month, Wednesdays after 5:00 PM
place: Philadelphia Museum of Art, 2600 Benjamin Franklin Pkwy
desc: Pay what you wish (suggested $1+). First Sundays also feature special activities.

title: Barnes Foundation - Free First Sunday
place: Barnes Foundation, 2025 Benjamin Franklin Pkwy, Philadelphia
desc: Free admission to one of the world's finest art collections on First Sundays.

title: The Alamo
place: The Alamo, 300 Alamo Plaza, San Antonio
desc: Free admission to historic mission. Timed entry required.

title: San Antonio Museum of Art - Free Tuesdays
place: San Antonio Museum of Art, 200 W Jones Ave
desc: Free admission for all visitors on Tuesday evenings.

title: Balboa Park - Free Tuesdays
place: Balboa Park, San Diego
desc: Rotating schedule: each Tuesday, different museums offer free admission to residents.

title: La Jolla Tide Pools
place: La Jolla Coast, San Diego
desc: Free tide pooling â€” observe marine life in natural pools during low tide.

title: Dallas Museum of Art - Free Admission
place: DMA, 1717 N Harwood St, Dallas
desc: Permanent collection always free. Special exhibitions may have fee.

title: Nasher Sculpture Center - Free First Saturdays
date: First Saturday of month, 11:00 AM-5:00 PM
place: Nasher Sculpture Center, 2001 Flora St, Dallas
desc: Free admission for all visitors on the first Saturday of each month.

title: San Jose Museum of Art - Free First Sundays
place: San Jose Museum of Art, 110 S Market St
desc: Free admission on first weekend of month.

title: Tech Museum - Free Days
place: The Tech Interactive, 201 S Market St, San Jose
desc: Free admission to some exhibits on certain community days.

title: Blanton Museum of Art - Free Thursdays
place: Blanton Museum, 200 E Martin Luther King Jr Blvd, Austin
desc: Free admission every Thursday. One of the best university art museums.

title: Barton Springs Pool - Early Morning Free
place: Barton Springs Pool, Zilker Park, Austin
desc: Free early morning swimming in natural spring-fed pool. Entry fee applies after 8 AM.

title: Cummer Museum - Free Saturdays
place: Cummer Museum, 829 Riverside Ave, Jacksonville
desc: Free admission with beautiful gardens and art collection.

title: Jacksonville Beach
place: Jacksonville Beach
desc: Free access to one of Florida's best beaches. Parking fees may apply.
